required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Current Situation and Analysis of ICU Management for Severe Trauma Patients in China
clinical_study.official_title: Current Situation and Analysis of ICU Management in Severe Trauma Patients: A Survey From 12 Provinces in China

brief_summary.textblock: Over the past 10 years, there has not been a consensus on ICU nursing management based on the concept of injury control. Case management for patients with serious trauma continues to be initiated in general services and after discharge.There is no critical care unit case management strategy for the high-risk population following acute intake. Consequently, there is an urgent need to develop and enhance ICU nursing best practice after injury control.

primary_outcome.measure: Cognition of ICU severe trauma patient
primary_outcome.description: The management status of severe trauma patients: including 5 dimensions of risk factor management, related complications management, ICU transition ward preparation plan, discharge preparation plan, and doctor-patient communication

arm_group.arm_group_label: ICU management for patients with severe trauma
arm_group.description: Group to investigate the current status of ICU management for patients with severe trauma

intervention.arm_group_label: ICU management for patients with severe trauma

study_pop.textblock: Formally hired, and working in ICU for more than 6 months, with ICU trauma patient management experience

overall_official.affiliation: Jinling Hosp Res Inst of general surgery,Nanjing Univ,Sch Med

facility.name: Jinling Hosp Res Inst of general surgery,Nanjing Univ Sch Med
